*div1 type="summary"* *p*Difficulty with settlers in east Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Colo. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Enclosed are some letters to the *person_mentioned*departments of Governt*/person_mentioned*. the forwarding of which by the earliest opportunity will confer a singular favour.*/p*
*p*We have no opportunity direct from here of communicating with the *person_mentioned*Government*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I found in my return from your *location_mentioned*place */location_mentioned*that there had a consider able storm arisen, heavy threats to send me over the *location_mentioned*Sabine*/location_mentioned*; but I came out in a Herricane and promised to send in irons any man who dared acknowledge the threat to *location_mentioned*saltillo*/location_mentioned*, sounded the trump all around bidding defiance to all their threats and bidding them to leave the *location_mentioned*lands */location_mentioned*or come forward and make arrangements to pay for them. They are now all friendly promise to pay me for their *location_mentioned*lands*/location_mentioned* and spend their lives in my defence I expect *person_mentioned*Leftwitch*/person_mentioned* on every day and anticipate the happiness of spending some happy hours united with yourself and the *person_mentioned*Baron*/person_mentioned* whom I am in hopes will soon return. I am crowded with *location_mentioned*friends */location_mentioned*and letters from every *location_mentioned*quarter*/location_mentioned* at this moment which prevents my saying a thousand things to you, I am compelled to omit at this moment. Wishing you every prosperity and happiness remain yours*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Haden Edwards*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p**location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-09-1826">Jany 9th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*N. B. please write me by the first opportunaty.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*B. E.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
